title: LFT Plat 2 mid

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Was an ADC main, who is transitioning to mid, looking for a team to improve my mid lane at a quicker rate.

Would prefer teams who are quite serious.

Thankyou,

Desires

replies.body: diamond adc add me ign rundibaaz
